author: Howard Boyle

comments.message: Great to have you onboard! We notice your post is currently unpublished. Was this your intention? We'd love to have it included on the challenge. You can publish it by hitting the Publish Entry up there on the right of your post. Looking forward to seeing more of you on conversations across this challenge…

Hi Howard, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

description: Video library of existing field conditions.
summary: Provide video to this community of each specific challenge so that we can solve the existing problems.
title: We need a video library of existing field conditions.
